DataElement.preferredName: Person Spermatozoon Donor Consent Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation related to the patient's agreement/consent for any questions related to sperm donation as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Spermatozoon Donor Consent Agreement Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion._One that contributes something._Permission to do something._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The male reproductive cell that is formed in the testicle. A sperm consists of a head, a body, and a tail that provides propulsion.

Concepts.definition: The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does male patient agree not t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm during the course of this study or within 120 days after receiving their last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm during treatment period and for at least 4 months after last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree to avoid fathering a child or donating sperm during the study and for three (3) months after the last dose of olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient treated or enrolled on this protocol agree to use two highly effective forms of contraception and avoid sperm donation prior to the study, for the duration of study participation, and for six months after discontinuation of olaparib and radium-223 administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree to avoid donating sperm for three (3) months after the last dose of olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm while on study and for at least 16 weeks after last dose of study medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm throughout the period of taking study drugs and for 3 months following the last dose of study drugs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient, treated or enrolled on this protocol agree to avoid donating sperm during the study period, and to use adequate contraception prior to the study, for the duration of study participation, and for 6 months after completing treatment administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree to refrain from sperm donation from initial study drug administration until 90 days after the last dose of study drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm during exposure to study drug and for 3 months  after study drug discontinuation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm throughout the period of taking study drugs and for 4 months after the last dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is male, does the patient agree to not freeze or donate sperm starting at screening and throughout the study period, and at least 6 months after the final study drug administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient is male, does the patient agree to not freeze or donate sperm starting at screening and throughout the study period, and at least 4 months after the final study drug administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree to not donate sperm while on study and for 12 weeks after last dose of study medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to freeze or donate sperm starting at screening and throughout the study period, and at least 4 months after the final study drug administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm during treatment with Olaparib and for 6 months after last dose of Olaparib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does male patient agree not to donate sperm during the study and for 3 months after the last study drug administration?

DataElement.changeDescription: AQT added for protocol 10389. AK 10/19/16 tt, released. 10/13/16 tt, 9767.
